headline.print_headline: For Lindros, Opportunity Is Knocking on the Door to the Hall of Fame
headline.main: For Eric Lindros, Opportunity Is Knocking on the Door to the Hockey Hall of Fame

snippet: Lindros, a dominant player whose career was shortened because of injuries, has a good chance to become a member of the class of 2016 thanks to a weaker crop of first-time eligibles.
lead_paragraph: Lindros, a dominant player whose career was shortened because of injuries, has a good chance to become a member of the class of 2016 thanks to a weaker crop of first-time eligibles.
